snippet.title: Not It: Spookiest Edition - Welcome to Easthollow!
snippet.description:
Welcome to historic Easthollow where the story of Not It: Spookiest Edition takes place! Featuring talented voice actor Anthony Sardinha as Easthollow's beloved Mayor.

"Katie has just moved to a new town on Halloween, only to discover that there’s a curse that plagues the town every year on the spooky holiday. Though she may not necessarily believe in the curse, she gets wrapped up in this old mystery that unfolds throughout the night.

As the unfortunate events with the curse transpire on Halloween, Katie and the townsfolk are all trapped in the inn, with no understanding of how and why they’re being held. The only goal they have is to make it until morning, and get everyone out alive."

Wishlist Not It: Spookiest Edition on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1719770/Not_It_Spookiest_Edition/

Follow Snowhaven Studios on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SnowhavenStudio
Trailer Created By: https://twitter.com/PogoNR
Voice Actor Anthony Sardinha: https://twitter.com/AntfishVO
See our other visual novels: https://snowhavenstudios.com/our-titles/
